3. tarantulatarantism 跳舞病taratantara 喇叭声
taradiddle 谎话tarantism 毒蛛舞蹈症taraxy 过敏性
另一种tarantula 指欧洲狼蛛(Lycosa tarantula),被它咬了之后会手舞足蹈或癫狂而有舞蹈症(tarantism)之称。若Tarantula 用作属名,则属于鞭蝎类(whip scorpion).

list.abs: taranome 刺嫩芽, tarant 塔兰特, taranov 塔拉诺夫

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Italian tarantismo, from the name of the seaport Taranto, after which the tarantula is also named. Compare with tarantella

means.word_mean: 1. a nervous disorder characterized by an uncontrollable impulse to dance; popularly attributed to bite of the southern European tarantula or wolf spider
